g.office_id AS "goods.office.id", g.goods_category AS "goods.goodsCategory", g.goods_code AS "goods.goodsCode", g.goods_name AS "goods.goodsName", g.goods_type AS "goods.goodsType", g.unit AS "goods.unit", g.goods_spec AS "goods.goodsSpec", g.approval_number AS "goods.approvalNumber", g.manufacturer AS "goods.manufacturer", o2.name AS "goods.office.name"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sale_valuation( id, sale_id, goods_id, one_price, one_price_customer_lk_id, two_price, two_price_customer_lk_id, three_price, three_price_customer_lk_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{saleId}, #{goodsId}, #{onePrice}, #{onePriceCustomerLkId}, #{twoPrice}, #{twoPriceCustomerLkId}, #{threePrice}, #{threePriceCustomerLkId}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sale_valuation SET sale_id = #{saleId}, goods_id = #{goodsId}, one_price = #{onePrice}, one_price_customer_lk_id = #{onePriceCustomerLkId}, two_price = #{twoPrice}, two_price_customer_lk_id = #{twoPriceCustomerLkId}, three_price = #{threePrice}, three_price_customer_lk_id = #{threePriceCustomerLkId}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
